Html:
Hi, I wish to use this class also in a Windows Phone 7 project, but there are a lot of non-supported class like xpath, hashtable and arraylist.

Have you some plans to port HtmlAgilityPack also to the Windows Phone 7 platform?

 

thanks,
Luca S.

I just checked in the HAPPhone project and solution into SVN. I've only done minimal testing but so far everything seems to work. I included a sample phone application that gets a list of links

Removing xpath, hashtable and arraylist had already been done in the current SVN codebase after the 1.4.0 release. I did a HAPLight project for Silverlight 4.0 which paved most of the way for the WP7 version. I really hope that the next version of WP7 is upgraded to SL4. Too many things missing, implicit styles, direct content for buttons, improved XAML parsing...
